Evolutio d.o.o..position_desc:
Who are we, and what are we looking for?
With a wide range of products and services, we specialize in software development with a focus on Web design and mobile and Web application development. We want to expand our business by developing new products, entering new sectors, and gaining international clients. We are looking for motivated and professional people who will strengthen the existing team and add new value to it.
Your responsibilities
- Understanding of how to build performant, decoupled, testable, maintainable code
- Team code reviews, tests and "Pair Programming"
- Sharing knowledge with teammates, and working collaboratively when you need help
- Contribution of your knowledge and curiosity towards innovative technologies and methods in internal working groups and thus contribution to the continuous development of the organization
- Remote communication
Evolutio d.o.o..competences:
Qualifications & Experience
- knowledge of working with Kotlin and Java
- knowledge of agile working methods and GIT
- knowledge of design and communication with RESTful API-s
- expressed analytical-logical abilities
- active knowledge of English (both spoken and written)
- proactivity and responsibility in working and learning new technologies
- ability to learn quickly and work in a team
What We Offer
- Exciting projects: varied and challenging tasks, cooperation with foreign clients, latest IT methods and techniques
- Collaborative environment: a collegial, team-oriented working environment with flat hierarchies and short decision paths
- Professional development: extensive training opportunities (internal and external)
- Fun perks: motivating work environment with relax zones, social and teambuilding activities, stocked kitchen
- Work-life balance: flexible working hours, hybrid workplace

AmdoSoft Systems d.o.o..company_desc:
Our Company
Established in 1998, AmdoSoft Systems is an IT automation software vendor with focus on protecting and automating critical business processes.
We support our customers in identifying their automation potential and offer a solution with which they can increase the efficiency of their business processes, while relieving their human resources, saving time and reducing costs.
Robotic Process Automation
The core of our b4 technology is an integrated workflow management in which every business process is graphically represented step by step and actions are defined according to an "if-then principle". As a result, our b4 Bots execute processes according to defined specifications. Disruptions or weaknesses of the process are correlated directly with the IT department, and correction processes are triggered automatically.
Intelligent process automation with AI
A large part of business processes consists of unstructured data for which RPA itself is insufficient. By complementing RPA with AI technologies, our b4 bots can also understand the meaning and content of documents and edit them accordingly.

FreshBooks d.o.o..position_desc:
FreshBooks
is a product software company, building an elite cloud-based accounting solution for small and midsize service-type businesses. It is a global company with over 700 employees, founded in Canada, today with offices also in the U.S., Netherlands, Mexico, Germany, and Croatia. Known for its extraordinary product and customer experience, FreshBooks reached unicorn status in 2021 and is focused on serving customers across 160 countries.
FreshBooks is currently seeking interns to
join our Engineering team as Software Engineers
. Here at FreshBooks, we pride ourselves on our inclusive internship environment, where interns are fully integrated into our Engineering team and have the opportunity to work alongside our experienced engineers. By joining us, you will have the opportunity to
work in a company that has a global impact
. We provide 1:1 mentorship with a Senior Developer to help shape your unique experience at FreshBooks.
You will learn how to:
Write scalable code for our various microservices using Python and Ruby
Write interactive UI components for our web app using EmberJs and JavaScript
Deploy applications with modern infrastructure using Docker, Jenkins, Kubernetes, and Google Cloud Platform
Collaborate with your team to implement and develop brand new features
FreshBooks is looking for interns who are:
Interested in being a part of the product-oriented company
Motivated to learn more about building software
Interested in behind the scenes processes of building software and managing production incidents
Motivated to be part of the international environment with global impact
Interested in learning more about genuine teamwork
Able to work for min. 30h/per week
Able to work for 4 months
, with the possibility of extending the internship agreement
What we offer:
Structured mentorship
and assistance
An inclusive approach where you will actively participate in teamsâ€™ projects
Fully paid internship
Equipment provided by the company
Flexible working hours
(our engineers are both in CET and ET timezones, you can choose what works best for you)
Remote-friendly internship
(work from home or from our Zagreb office - up to you!)
FreshBooks is actively building a diverse workplace and we understand that skills and talent can come in a variety of forms. We are a motivated bunch with our focus set on shipping extraordinary experiences to businesses all over the world.
Submit your application today and we will be in touch with you shortly!
FreshBooks d.o.o..compensation: The internship is paid by the hour through Student Centre Zagreb.

Big data
platforme, izgradnje modula za obradu i analizu podataka(

Memgraph d.o.o..company_desc:
Memgraph is a fast-growing startup in the rapidly emerging graph database industry. Our cloud-native graph database platform helps companies around the world turn complex data into optimal decisions by solving a class of problems using graph theory.
Our commitment to innovation, technological advancement, and developer experience make Memgraph the #1 graph analytic platform that delivers the fastest and easiest solution for solving complex graph data problems in production environments, in a time frame previously unimaginable.
Memgraph d.o.o..position_desc:
A
graph
cadabra!
It's been a long time since magic entered the realm of graphs. Wizards in Memgraph have already developed rudimentary tools to tackle the magic spells. The secret project
MAGE
is now looking for young energy ready to master new spells (technologies) such as
Graph Machine Learning
and optimize existing ones. Join on the path to demystifying new technologies and creating problem-solving solutions for a variety of
different industries
.
MAGE
is an open-source library for graph analytics and learning. Exploiting the hidden knowledge from nodes and edges is what we do in Memgraph in our day-to-day activities. We care about the performance, scalability, and correctness of our algorithms which are used by different developers across the globe. To maintain such collection, we allow for building the algorithms in C, C++, Python, or Rust, with the C++ being the tool for developing the infrastructure needed to execute the algorithms. To maintain the quality, the project requires constant work and research.
An internship is planned to offer flexibility in terms of your preferences across the work related to Project MAGE. What you'll learn how to tackle is the following:
Contributing to the planning sessions.
Work on the exploring some of the cutting edge technology:
Graph Machine Learning [Graph Neural Networks]
GPU powered graph algorithms
Low-level optimizations of current graph algorithms
Newly built graph algorithms
Researching new technologies in research-based sessions.
Upgrading the quality of current solutions.
Solving real-world problems (e.g. drug-drug interaction).
Creating top-quality blog posts.
Memgraph d.o.o..competences:
Do you have the right qualifications for this project?
Don't hesitate to apply even if your current skills do not match the above description, you'll be able to acquire them during the internship. However, if you are familiar with some of the mentioned stuff, put it in a visible spot on your CV so we can select exactly you! Remember, the most important factor is your strive for learning!
C, C++, Python, Rust, Algorithms, Memgraph, Cypher
What does the interview process look like?
We'll ask you to submit a CV, a cover letter (optional), your GitHub repo, or a specific project you are proud of, and then we'll discuss your projects during a half-hour interview. Nothing too complicated and no live coding - we know that technical interviews are stressful and that exams are around the corner!

Memgraph d.o.o..company_desc:
Memgraph is a fast-growing startup in the rapidly emerging graph database industry. Our cloud-native graph database platform helps companies around the world turn complex data into optimal decisions by solving a class of problems using graph theory.
Our commitment to innovation, technological advancement, and developer experience make Memgraph the #1 graph analytic platform that delivers the fastest and easiest solution for solving complex graph data problems in production environments, in a time frame previously unimaginable.
Memgraph d.o.o..position_desc:
During this internship, you will work with the engineering team at Memgraph to develop a full-fledged, end-to-end web application that will solve a specific problem using Memgraph. For example, you could create an application that detects fraudulent transactions in a financial network or an app that uses geospatial data for ride-hailing. We have prepared a few exciting topics and suggestions, but you will also be able to pitch your own ideas. The only requirement is that the web application needs to incorporate
Memgraph
and solve a real-world problem.
This internship is an opportunity to work on a complete web application, from start to finish and:
Observe the whole development process.
Contribute to planning sessions.
Work on both the backend and frontend.
Help us create the content to promote it among developers.
Best of all, watch your app have an impact on developers everywhere!
Maybe this sounds a bit overwhelming at first, but you donâ€™t have to worry. The app will be simple enough for you to learn everything there is to know on time, and we will be there every step of the way. Which programming language you use is not important. Whatâ€™s important is your willingness to learn and contribute.
If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to
careers@memgraph.com
.
Memgraph d.o.o..competences:
Do you have the right qualifications for this project?
The answer is definitely YES. Everything needed for this project can be learned and achieved if you are just motivated. We will organize lectures to get everyone started, and you will also get a personal mentor that will guide you through the whole experience. The only essential thing is good knowledge of the English language.
But if you want your application to stand out, it's good to include any skills or projects similar to what will be in focus during the internship:
Python, Algorithms, Full-stack development, UI/UX, Memgraph, Cypher
What does the interview process look like?
We'll ask you to submit a CV, a cover letter (optional), your GitHub repo, or a specific project you are proud of, and then we'll discuss your projects during a half-hour interview. Nothing too complicated and no live coding - we know that technical interviews are stressful and that exams are around the corner!

Avery Dennison Atma d.o.o..company_desc:
Avery Dennison (NYSE: AVY) is a 500 fortune company presenting itself as a global leader in materials science, specializing in the design and manufacture of a wide variety of labeling and functional materials. The companyâ€™s products, which are used in nearly every major industry, include pressure-sensitive materials for labels and graphic applications; tapes and other bonding solutions for industrial, medical, and retail applications; tags, labels, and embellishments for apparel; and radio frequency identification (RFID) solutions serving retail apparel and other markets.
atma is Sanskrit for "soul". Avery Dennisonâ€™s vision is that every product should have a unique digital ID or "soul" that persists throughout the value chain and enables all stakeholders to see the true self (or atma) of the product. Avery Dennison launched the atma.io venture and its connected product cloud to serve as the foundation for sustainable, trusted connections between every item, every company, and every person.

Rimac Technology d.o.o..company_desc:
Rimac Technology today is a 1,000-people company based in Zagreb, Croatia. It is focused on engineering, development, production, and supply of high-performance battery systems, electric drive units, electronic systems, and user interface components that Rimac is known for, having established a reputation as a leading provider of advanced performance electrification technologies.
Rimac Technology works with many car manufacturers in Europe, using its experiences in developing Nevera from the ground-up to offer a service that takes customers right the way through the process.
As a student, you will get the opportunity to work on pioneering projects in the automotive industry, alongside some of the most talented and innovative minds around. If you are ready to hit the ground running, you will grow and excel in our fast-moving workplace. Weâ€™re ready to test the next generation of talent. Up for the challenge?
What we offer?
The opportunity to develop world-class solutions with cutting-edge technology, from scratch!
Family-like and open work environment
Courageous, curious and entrepreneurial team members to work with
Dog-friendly office
Financial support for transportation
Rimac Technology d.o.o..position_desc:
If you are interested in electric vehicles, battery packs and BMS then this is the perfect job for you. The Battery Management System (BMS) is one of the most important systems in an electric vehicle. It controls the whole battery pack and is responsible for proper functioning of the battery pack.
As an System Engineer Intern in BMS team you will have opportunity to work inside cross functional team of embedded hardware, embedded software and testing engineers. You will also be in close touch with other departments inside the company like logistics, purchasing, warehouse and manufacturing. System Engineer Intern will work on high level aspect of BMS which includes integration of different BMS components like BMS Master, BMS Slave, HV Current sensor, etc, as well as performing some high level tests and debugging of the problems on the whole battery pack level and preparing test reports. In addition to that you will support Project Development Leads on BMS projects with creation of different kind of reports, analysis of log files and analysis of system requirements.
You will join young and enthusiastic team of experienced engineers who are working on many exciting projects for top automotive companies in the world. Some of successfully finished projects are Rimac Nevera, Aston Martin Valkyrie and Koenigsegg Regera

Basic knowledge of embedded systems architecture
Basic knowledge of electronic components and systems
Basic knowledge of C programming language
Basic knowledge of communication protocols (UART, SPI, I2C, CAN, etc.)
Basic knowledge of handling various laboratory equipment, such as the DMMs, power supplies, oscilloscopes, and other measurement equipment
Attention to details
Pedantic work attitude
Good will to learn and research new technologies
Nice to have skills and competence:
Experience with Altium Designer or other PCB design software
Experience in working with embedded systems or battery powered devices through university or hobby is desirable

Rimac Technology d.o.o..position_desc:
Embedded Hardware Engineer Intern position will grant you an opportunity to be a part of engineering team working on the development of hardware components for Bugatti-Rimac vehicles and OEM projects. You will work in dynamic and supportive environment with experienced and ambitious engineers on high-end state-of-the-art projects utilizing latest technologies in respective fields and automotive industry. You will learn how design process looks like, requirements are defined and transferred to final product, cooperation between hardware and software teams works, high-end multi-layer PCBs are designed, documentation is made, and tests are performed. Besides standard design topics you will get in touch with automotive processes and standards like ECE-R10, LV124, Functional Safety (ISO 26262) and others.
As Embedded Hardware Engineer intern you will get an opportunity to work in one of three main Embedded Hardware teams located in Zagreb; BMS, IVI and Inverter. You will be assigned to the team that will fit you best according to your abilities and aspirations.
Battery Management System (BMS) is one of the most important systems in an electric vehicle. It controls the whole battery pack and is responsible for proper functioning of the battery pack. The BMS is responsible for voltage and temperature measurements of all battery cells, current, isolation and voltage measurements of the battery pack, as well as controlling the pre-charge circuit and all high-voltage relays and contactors.
Infotainment system (IVI) is highly complex system providing mixture of information and entertainment to the occupants. IVI system is usually comprised of various displays, main and supportive control units, antennas, cameras, audio devices and similar. What differentiates IVI systems from other is high-speed design along with specific EMC requirements.
Inverter is, along with battery and motor, most important device in electric car. Its purpose is to drive electric motor using energy from the battery and doing it in a way to keep high efficiency, high level of control and utilizing maximum performance from electric motor. As Inverter is high-voltage and high-power component, design teams face various cooling, insulation, and EMC/EMI challenges on their way to develop reliable and powerful product.

Rimac Technology d.o.o..position_title: Embedded Hardware Librarian and Support Engineer Intern
Rimac Technology d.o.o..position_desc:
Embedded Hardware Librarian and Support Engineer Intern position will grant you an opportunity to support various engineering teams with development of hardware components for Rimac Automobili vehicles and OEM projects. You will work in dynamic and supportive environment with experienced and ambitious engineers on high-end state-of-the-art projects utilizing latest technologies in respective fields and automotive industry.
Your tasks will be to build and maintain electronic component and product database within Altium Concord platform. This includes designing and updating symbols and footprints for various components, checking, and defining component parameters, validating components to be used in design, familiarizing with IPC and other industry standards, building knowledge on reliable design and more. Besides librarian tasks, you will also support engineering teams with ordering of components for prototyping, tools, and office supplies through ERP system, tracking of department budget, making RFQs and communicating with suppliers to receive technical support and quotations.

Rimac Technology d.o.o..position_desc:
As an Intern in Embedded Software Development department, you will be given an opportunity to learn about the intricacies of developing high performance automotive components which are key performance drivers of the world class sports and supercars. You will learn about the processes which turn ideas into products.
As part of your day to day you will collaborate with the colleagues from your team and will be given tasks related to the active development of our customer's projects. Don't worry, you will be given a mentor who will guide you and give you feedback on the decisions you make to make sure that your contribution not only leads to the success of our customers but is also a learning experience.
You will be placed into one of the teams which is tasked with developing software and integrating the various components such as Infotainment, Battery Management System, Traction Inverter, Vehicle Control Units, and many others.
We're proud of our open environment where information flows freely with little to no restriction, and everyone is encouraged to contribute and give honest feedback.
Responsibilities
Designing and implementing embedded software end-to-end
RTOS and "bare metal" programming
Collaborating with our hardware engineering team
Proposing new ideas and problem-solving
Collaborating with a multidisciplinary team of engineers
Rimac Technology d.o.o..competences:
Keen interest in automotive industry
Willingness to learn
University level development skills in C/C++
University knowledge of microcontroller peripherals
Good knowledge of English (written and spoken)

Rimac Technology d.o.o..company_desc:
Rimac Technology today is a 1,000-people company based in Zagreb, Croatia. It is focused on engineering, development, production, and supply of high-performance battery systems, electric drive units, electronic systems, and user interface components that Rimac is known for, having established a reputation as a leading provider of advanced performance electrification technologies.
Rimac Technology works with many car manufacturers in Europe, using its experiences in developing Nevera from the ground-up to offer a service that takes customers right the way through the process.
As a student, you will get the opportunity to work on pioneering projects in the automotive industry, alongside some of the most talented and innovative minds around. If you are ready to hit the ground running, you will grow and excel in our fast-moving workplace. Weâ€™re ready to test the next generation of talent. Up for the challenge?
What we offer?
The opportunity to develop world-class solutions with cutting-edge technology, from scratch!
Family-like and open work environment
Courageous, curious and entrepreneurial team members to work with
Dog-friendly office
Financial support for transportation
Rimac Technology d.o.o..position_desc:
As embedded software test engineer intern you will work with embedded test team testing the software that drives ECUs (electronic control units) of high performance cars where high hardware quality and reliability is required. You will join one of the most important teams in the development process, the team that is responsible to find all possible bugs and errors in the hardware and software. The embedded testing team plans and executes test cases that link requirements and functionalities (validation tests), performs hardware testing after HW design phase and static and dynamic code analysis on the final code (verification tests), plan and design end-of-line tests (both hardware and software in the loop) and define work instructions for the test execution.
As embedded software test engineer you will have opportunity to participate in:
writing and executing validation test cases on HIL system
writing and executing test cases using automotive debugger Lauterbach
writing and executing unit and integration tests in VectorCAST tool
learn about automotive software in general
learn about tools used in automotive testing
hands on experience with hardware and software
Rimac Technology d.o.o..competences:
good C programing skills
exceptional attention to detail
pedantic work attitude
will to learn and research new technologies
curious, motivated with can-do attitude
basic understanding of embedded system components and architecture are also required

The Blockhouse Technology Limited Zagreb.company_desc:
THE BLOCKHOUSE TECHNOLOGY
In the Blockhouse Technology we specialize in creating technology to make decentralized systems trustworthy. By using our technology our clients have control over personal data and are protected from fraud and hacker attacks. We are proud to have world-renowned researchers and developers from all over the world working with us.
Our main office is in Oxford. We have teams also working in Luxembourg, China and Croatia. Our main development team is in Zagreb, office located nearby FER. We have a flat structure and focus on optimizing our product with new technology. Rust is the programming language we use. We donâ€™t expect candidates to know Rust but they should be motivated to learn this programming language.
We are proud of our talented engineers and believe they will attract other talented engineers. If you are interested in gaining experience in developing a cloud privacy platform using distributed ledger technologies, contact us and send us your CV.
Email: zg-jobs@tbtl.com or anki@tbtl.com
The Blockhouse Technology Limited Zagreb.position_desc:
This year The Blockhouse Technology offers 4 interesting projects to students. Have a look and let us know which one you are interested in.
1. Digital Notary Service:
Help us develop Digital Notary Service using blockchain for notarization & verification of documents. Youâ€™ll get familiar with terms like accountability and integrity protection, as well as youâ€™ll learn a lot about hashing and digital signatures. Youâ€™ll get an opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies and use blockchain for real-life use-cases.
2. NFT:
Help us develop support for NFTs in our existing system. Youâ€™ll get familiar with Ethereum smart contracts, as well as youâ€™ll learn a lot about interacting with Ethereum blockchain. Youâ€™ll get an opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies and use blockchain for real-life use-cases.
3. Develop Custody API Playground
Build a multipurpose internal tool. The Playground lets Developers generate and transfer messages for our product API, allowing quick prototyping and debugging. The project has different segments: automate creating protocol messages, helper components for cryptography - handle signatures, hide network details inside the Playground, and make a simple GUI.
4. Security
Work as part of our Security team. You will get hands-on experience with using cryptographic primitives and building security-sensitive protocols. You will get to see how we analyse the security of our system, and will contribute to our discussions. You will get an opportunity to see how cryptography is used in the real world, all under the mentorship of our Security team.
P.S. We also have a CTF team, if youâ€™re into thatâ€¦
General info:
The summer internship can be done either from our office or partly from the office / on a remote basis. For us the internship projects are a good way of screening potential new employees and that is why we want to get to know and see how you might fit in our team. We think it is important you get acquainted with the us and the projects so if you prefer remote work please keep in mind the first 2 weeks you will be working from the office. Later meetings in the office will be upon agreement with the mentor.
How to apply and the selection process
If you would like to apply please upload your CV and send your application via the FER website. In your application please state which project(s) you are interested in and why. Students that pass our first screening will be interviewed. They can expect 2 interviews.
Students that do not pass our 1st screening will receive notification by mail so they have time to accept an other offer.
Good luck, we look forward to meeting you!

YAZAKI Europe Limited, Glavna podruÅ¾nic.company_desc:
Yazaki is a full-systems supplier of wire harness, electrical, and data products and solutions to all of the top 10 global automakers. With more than 249,000 employees in 45 countries, Yazaki is one of the  largest automotive supplier in the world. It provides customer support from initial concepts through from design and development to global mass production â€“ including after-sales-service parts. The companyâ€™s full-systems supplier expertise is helping global automotive manufacturers drive vehicle electrification, connectivity, and autonomy integration.
Yazaki has more than 75 years of wire harness, electrical, and data solutions experience and a deep understanding of global automotive standards. In addition to a comprehensive high-voltage products and systems portfolio, it has a wide range of high-voltage research and testing resources and extensive additive manufacturing and rapid prototyping capabilities.
As a truly global company deeply rooted in Japanese cultural traditions and values, Yazaki is a reliable partner for its customers. It is also committed to the preservation of the environment through the development of advanced electric components for hybrid and electric vehicles, the promotion of recycling, and the efficient use of resources.
Yazaki Branch Office Zagreb
is one of the companyâ€™s Regional Engineering Centers specializing in components. It employs approximately 150 people â€“ and growing. The center is continuing to expand its prototype build, automotive components testing and validation, high-voltage component and automotive data connection development, and advanced engineering activities.
To lear more you can chek us at:
https://www.yazaki-europe.com/index
YAZAKI Europe Limited, Glavna podruÅ¾nic.position_desc:
If you opt for a summer internship with us at Yazaki, we offer you the possibility to directly work in some of the most dynamic Teams at our Yazaki's R&D Center in Zagreb:
Data Connectivity and Advanced Engineering Team
as well as T
esting and Validation Team for HV, PDU & Data Connecitvity
. When we say dynamic - we mean collegial Teammates, always following new technology and growing with their knowledgeâ€¦ And now are willing to share their skills with you through a wellorganized and inclusive Student Internship program!
During the internship, you would have the possibility to participate in development, design, simulation, prototyping, verification and validation of electrical HighFequency and Data-Connectivity connection systems (Electro-Mechanical Connection Systems) for the European automotive market.
If you would like to get better familiar with:
PCB Design, on how to modify and improve/benchmark of electro-mechanical parts for automotive applications (preferred Connectors, Terminals, EDS Harness, ConnectivityDevices);
You are also motivated to get familiar with mechanic, electronic- and high-frequency basics so as simulations acting in an automotive environment with high impact of electrical and mechanical stress like temperature, humidity, etc.
You are interested to learn about Design, Layout and support of simple Circuits and/or PCBs with supporting related Processes from the Prototype phase until Production
And last but not least- you would like to first-hand experience working in a global corporation & leading automotive parts supplier which has truly long tradition and is culture blend of different experiences from a wide range of sources, but with roots firmly planted in Japan
.............then you are a perfect Candidate to apply for our internship!
Your Team members & Mentor have already prepared a detailed three-week (15 workign days) Student internship program which covers some following topics:
Basics of PCB construction
Using the Mentor Graphics Xpedition program
DRC check
Description of PCBs for production
Generating Gerber files
Introduction to CST Microwave Studio
Preparation of models for simulation
PCB / connector electrical performance simulation (S-parameters, TDR impedance, electric and magnetic field distribution).
Comparison of simulation and measurement (if there are measurement results)
PCB / connector optimization
Analysis of the influence of different materials on PCB / connector performance
Display and analysis of results in relation to the requirements of the specification
Introduction to the process of testing and validation of automotive RF components
Overview of RF components (connectors, wires, terminals, PCBâ€¦) and Introduction to basic test RF specifications
Activities within the OpenAlliance association
S-parameters - theoretical introduction
Preparation of samples for measurement on a network analyzer (VNA)
Measurement of RF parameters using a network analyzer (VNA)
Automate the measurement of RF parameters during production using LabView
Automated test report generation using Python
....
YAZAKI Europe Limited, Glavna podruÅ¾nic.competences:
Basic knowledge and/or interest for Simulation- and Design tools and other (e.g. ANSYS, CST, Eagle, Zyken, P-Spice, Mentor Graphics Designer, CST Microwave Studio etc.);
Some basic functional understanding of automotive wire harness connection systems
English language skills in written and spoken
Team oriented personality, with good communication and organization skills

Bugatti Rimac d.o.o..company_desc:
We design, engineer and build the most advanced automotive technology possible. From developing and manufacturing era-defining hypercars to inventing and building ground-breaking new technologies. We challenge convention and push technology to the edge of possibility.
Our teams develop and produce both hardware and software solutions for our flagship, record-breaking hypercar, the Nevera, as well as for other automotive manufacturersâ€™ vehicles. Working on technology solutions for partners such as Porsche, Hyundai, Aston Martin, Koenigsegg, Automobili Pininfarina, and others, gives Rimac a unique position of a technology leader in the high-performance electric vehicle industry.
Bugatti Rimac d.o.o..position_desc:
We are a technology powerhouse that designs, engineers, and manufactures the world's most advanced automotive technology and hypercars. Bytes to bolts, Rimac is where everything happens.
Our teams develop and produce both hardware and software solutions for our flagship, record-breaking hypercar, the Nevera, as well as for other automotive manufacturersâ€™ vehicles. Working on technology solutions for partners such as Porsche, Hyundai, Aston Martin, Koenigsegg, Automobili Pininfarina, and others, gives Rimac a unique position of a technology leader in the high-performance electric vehicle industry. The stakes are high.
As a fast-moving company, we nurture a high-performing culture. If you are interested in joining, you must be prepared for relentless learning, adapting, and embracing new technologies. We expect an easy-going person, but also self-driven, entrepreneurial, and highly independent in their work, that will enjoy rising to the challenge and have fun pushing the limits of technology.
Our expectations are high. And we can only achieve our goals with the dedication and collaboration of our exceptional team. Our ambition is to deliver and go the extra mile. We need to expand our already industry-leading team, find the best people, and lead the charge.
The
Control Systems Intern
will be part of the Control Systems Strategy group, which is responsible for leading the design and specification of innovative Control Systems, aiming to offer class leading attributes and customer experience from the perspective of vehicle performance, efficiency, durability, and reliability.
1. Work tasks and responsibilities:
Technical
Designing, implementing, verifying, and validating Control System Strategies at system and vehicle level, from SiL and HiL-rigs to prototype demonstrators and to series production.
Designing and delivering embedded software (SW) for virtual and physical Proof-Of-Concept of the proposed strategies and supporting the subsequent industrialization.
Supporting the definition of the Control Systems Roadmap for autonomy-related requirements and autonomy-enabled features relevant to the current and future platform portfolio.
Supporting E/E vehicle system architecture design capturing all Controls Systems implications.
Supporting Aerodynamics, Chassis, Powertrain actuation HW design and optimization by capturing the cross-functional implications of Control Systems, through the definition and implementation of appropriate control strategies and though engineering specification via target cascade processes.
Bugatti Rimac d.o.o..competences:
2. Requirements:
Essential Skillset
Excellent understanding of Control Systems theory and of embedded Control Systems.
Excellent knowledge of Matlab/Simulink/Stateflow, model-based controls and automatic code generation techniques for algorithm development.
Experience using simulation analysis techniques for vehicle and/or control system component(s).
Strong time management, accuracy, diligence, ability to balance multiple tasks.
Preferred Skillset
Competent user of Software development tools e.g., Vector CANape, CANoe, etc.
Experience of FMEA process and robust problem resolution, understanding of the V-process.
Systems-Engineering thinking and comprehension of interdependencies, e.g., E/E implications.
The selection process will include a brief interview so that we colud learn a bit more about your interests and motivation.
If you have any additional questions, you can reach out to our HR department via this e-mail address - vedrana.palavra@rimac-technology.com

The
Mechatronics Intern
will be part of the Control Systems Integration group, which is responsible for leading  the cross-functional integration of innovative Control Systems, aiming to offer class leading attributes and customer experience from the perspective of vehicle performance, efficiency, durability and reliability.
1. Work tasks and responsibilities:
Technical
System-engineering Control Systems and capturing the cross-functional Mechatronics implications as lead software and hardware (SW & HW) integrator of the Control Systems department.
Defining the Aerodynamics, Chassis, Powertrain actuation HW requirements through the integration of appropriate control strategies and though Engineering Specification via target cascade processes.
Cascading the E/E architecture requirements that deliver optimal Controls Systems performance.
Supporting the development and delivery of embedded software through virtual and physical Proof-Of-Concept of the proposed solutions and subsequent industrialization.
Bugatti Rimac d.o.o..competences:
2. Requirements:
Essential Skillset
Excellent understanding of Mechatronics and conceptual comprehension of the Integral HW & SW Engineering Specification concept and of the Design Verification Process for Control systems.
Intuitive understanding of FMEA & FuSa processes and robust problem resolution.
Understanding of the V-process and proficiency in using simulation tools (e.g., Matlab/Simulink) for vehicle to component ES cascade and advanced analysis techniques for data post-processing (e.g., nonlinear regression, machine learning, etc.) for component to vehicle verification loops.
Strong time management, accuracy, diligence, ability to balance multiple tasks.
Preferred Skillset
Understanding of Vehicle Performance and attributes in areas such Vehicle Dynamics, NVH, etc.
Understanding of requirements capture process and tools such as Jama, Polarion, Doors, etc.
Systems-Engineering thinking and comprehension of interdependencies, experience with relevant tools, e.g., SysML, and understanding of multidisciplinary simulation tools.

AGRIVI
is one of the leading global AgTech companies with a vision to change the way food is produced, positively impact over a billion people.
The AGRIVI approach to solving the global food problem is through the digitalization of agriculture, that is, by switching the farmerâ€™s decision-making reliant on traditional practices and historical knowledge to the new data-driven and fact-based decision-making empowered by best-growing practices and real-time agronomic insights available using technology.
At AGRIVI, we have built a comprehensive suite of digital agriculture solutions for farms, food companies, agribusiness banks, ministries of agriculture and other important stakeholders of the agri-food value chain to support them in adopting the change and empower their digital transformation projects. Join us! Become a game changer!
If you're eager to tackle the biggest problems of the agriculture of today, if you're ready for everyday learning and meeting new people and technologies, if you want to work with customers from all over the world and become a game changer in the biggest industry of today - then you're the one we want!
Apply here or contact us at
careers@agrivi.com
!

dSPACE engineering d.o.o..position_title: Razvojni inÅ¾enjer/ka - FPGA simulacija elektro pogona
dSPACE engineering d.o.o..position_desc:
High-fidelity simulation models of electrical machines, developed by dSPACE, include look-up tables (LUTs) for magnetic flux or inductance to model non-linear machine effects (e.g. saturation). Data for LUTs is usually provided by a customer and it is obtained by finite element simulation (FEM) or extensive laboratory measurements. Depending on the number of phases and modelling reference frame, the LUTs can be n-dimensional (n-D). For example, if a 3-phase PMSM is modelled in synchronous dq reference frame, LUTs are 2-D (dependant on d- and q-axis current). However, in case of higher number of phases, dimension of LUTs can grow beyond 3-D. If flux maps are provided by a customer, which is a very common case, those maps need to be inverted (original maps have current as input and magnetic flux as output, while inverted maps have magnetic flux as input and current as output).
The first step of this student work would be extensive research of scientific literature to define state-of-the-art methods for inversion of n-D LUTs with application in electrical machine modelling. The following step would include defining the best methods for inversion of flux tables and implementation using Matlab scripts. Test data for the proposed methods could be generated inside the company using FEM tools. During testing phase it is also necessary to take into account accuracy of the proposed methods, using different interpolation approaches, handling data outside of the defined range (extrapolation approaches), execution speed of the proposed inversion methods (especially in case of large data LUTs), etc. Once the methods are successfully verified offline, the final step includes embedding LUTs with the developed methods into generic drive FPGA model (GDM) and performing online tests using dSpace hardware.
dSPACE engineering d.o.o..competences:
Basic knowledge in electrical drives
Basic knowledge in Matlab programming
Good mathematical background/interest in solving complex mathematical problems
